bot.title: [+] A bot has joined the server!
bot.description:
<@{{ member }}> joined the server, this user is a bot.

Account create: <t:{{ createdAt }}:R>

vanity.title: [+] A member has joined the server!
vanity.description:
{{ member }} **joined via vanity code**.

Account create: <t:{{ createdAt }}:R>

first.title: [+] A member has joined the server!
first.description:
{{ member }} **joined for the second time**, their invitation is **invalid**.

Code used: `{{ code }}`
Account create: <t:{{ createdAt }}:R>

first_vanity.title: [+] A member has joined the server!
first_vanity.description:
{{ member }} **joined via vanity code** for the second time

Account create: <t:{{ createdAt }}:R>

invalid.title: [+] A member has joined the server!
invalid.description:
{{ member }} **unable to find your inviter**.

Account create: <t:{{ createdAt }}:R>

valid.title: [+] A member has joined the server!
valid.description:
<@{{ member }}> **invited by** <@{{ inviter }}> **who now has** `{{ invites }}` invitations.

Code used: `{{ code }}`
Account create: <t:{{ createdAt }}:R>

valid_source.title: [+] A member has joined the server!
valid_source.description:
<@{{ member }}> **invited by** <@{{ inviter }}> **who now has** `{{ invites }}` invitations.

Source: `{{ source }}`
Account create: <t:{{ createdAt }}:R>

bot.title: [-] A bot has left the server!
bot.description:
<@{{ member }}> left the server, this user is a bot.

Account create: <t:{{ createdAt }}:R>

vanity.title: [-] A member has left the server!
vanity.description:
{{ member }} left, **joined via vanity code**.

Account create: <t:{{ createdAt }}:R>

invalid.title: [-] A member has left the server!
invalid.description:
{{ member }} left, **unable to find inviter**.

Account create: <t:{{ createdAt }}:R>

valid.title: [-] A member has left the server!
valid.description:
<@{{ member }}> left, **invited by** <@{{ inviter }}> **who now has** `{{ invites }}` invitations.

Code used: `{{ code }}`
Account create: <t:{{ createdAt }}:R>

valid_source.title: [-] A member has left the server!
valid_source.description:
<@{{ member }}> left, **invited by** <@{{ inviter }}> **who now has** `{{ invites }}` invitations.

Source: `{{ source }}`
Account create: <t:{{ createdAt }}:R>

insufficient_permission.title: Unauthorized Command!
insufficient_permission.description: You are not authorized to execute this command!

unknown_command.title: Error!
unknown_command.description: This command is unknown or does not exist.

create.description: Create an invitation link that never expires

check.description: Discover which members hava utilized this code or identify the member associated with it

success_display.title: Validated Invites
success_display.description: <@{{ member }}> has **{{ valid }}** invitations (**{{ total }}** Regular, **{{ invalid }}** Left, **{{ bonus }}** Bonus, **{{ fake }}** Fake).

error_display.title: Retrieval Failed
error_display.description: Unable to retrieve invitations from <@{{ member }}>.

invalid_bonus.title: Bonus Error
invalid_bonus.description: The bonus is **negative** or exceeds **32 bits**!

error_bonus.title: Insertion Error
error_bonus.description: An error occurred while trying to insert this bonus.

success_bonus_add.title: Bonus Added
success_bonus_add.description: The user <@{{ member }}> has successfully added **{{ number }}** invitations!

success_bonus_remove.title: Bonus Removed
success_bonus_remove.description: The user <@{{ member }}> has successfully removed **{{ number }}** invitations!

error_reset.title: Reset Error
error_reset.description: An error occurred while trying to reset invitations.

existed_link.title: Link Exists
existed_link.description: You already have an invitation link (**{{ link }}**).

unable_create_link.title: Creation Failed
unable_create_link.description: Unable to create the invitation link, maybe the bot does not have permissions or the server has more than 1000 links.

updated_link.title: Update Offered
updated_link.description:
You already have an invitation link (**{{ link }}**).

Do you want to update it with the new source (**{{ source }}**)?

success_link.title: Link Created
success_link.description: Your invitation link has been created (**{{ link }}**)!

error_link.title: Saving Error
error_link.description: An error occurred while saving your invitation link.

invalid_check.title: Check Error
invalid_check.description: You must specify at least one code or member.

no_member_check.title: Absent Member
no_member_check.description: No members were found with this information.

success_member_check.title: Success Check
success_member_check.description:
A member was found with this information:

Member: <@{{ member }}>
Inviter: <@{{ inviter }}>

Code: **{{ code }}**
Created: <t:{{ createdAt }}:R>

Left: **{{ inactive }}**
Fake: **{{ fake }}**

success_code_check.title: Success Check
success_code_check.description:
Members who joined with this code:

```{{ members }}```

error_check.title: Error Check
error_check.description: An error occurred while trying to find information.

exclude.description: Exclude a member or role from the leaderboard display

include.description: Include a member or role from the leaderboard display

top.description: Define how many members the leaderboard should display

left.description: Define whether members who have left the server should be displayed

no_inviter.title: No Inviter
no_inviter.description: No inviters were found in this server!

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.pre_description: {{ index }}) <@{{ inviter }}> has **{{ valid }}** invitations (**{{ total }}** Regular, **{{ invalid }}** Left, **{{ bonus }}** Bonus, **{{ fake }}** Fake).

excluded_role.title: Role Excluded
excluded_role.description: This role (<@&{{ target }}>) has been excluded from the leaderboard display.

excluded_member.title: Member Excluded
excluded_member.description: This member (<@{{ target }}>) has been excluded from the leaderboard display.

included_role.title: Role Included
included_role.description: This role (<@&{{ target }}>) has been included from the leaderboard display.

included_member.title: Member Included
included_member.description: This member (<@{{ target }}>) has been included from the leaderboard display.

error_included_role.title: Error Included
error_included_role.description: An error occurred while trying to include role <@&{{ target }}>.

error_included_member.title: Error Included
error_included_member.description: An error occurred while trying to include member <@{{ target }}>.

error_excluded_role.title: Error Excluded
error_excluded_role.description: An error occurred while trying to exclude role <@&{{ target }}>.

error_excluded_member.title: Error Excluded
error_excluded_member.description: An error occurred while trying to exclude member <@{{ target }}>.

invalid_top.title: Invalid Top
invalid_top.description: The top must be greater than 0 and less than 25.

success_top.title: Success Top
success_top.description: The number of members displayed has been changed to `{{ top }}`.

error_top.title: Error Top
error_top.description: An error occurred while trying to change the top to `{{ top }}`.

success_left_true.title: Success Show
success_left_true.description: Members who have left the server will now be visible in the leaderboard display

success_left_false.title: Success Show
success_left_false.description: Members who have left the server will now not be visible in the leaderboard display

error_left.title: Error Show
error_left.description: An error occurred while trying to change the show to `{{ show }}`.

number.description: Number of invitations to have the role

delete.description: Remove this role from members who have it

invalid_options.title: Options Invalid
invalid_options.description: The options (role and/or number) are invalid.

error_add.title: Addition Error
error_add.description: An error occurred while trying to add the role (<@&{{ role }}>) with **{{ number }}** invitation(s).

success_add.title: Role Added
success_add.description: The role (<@&{{ role }}>) has been successfully added.

existed_role.title: Role Exists
existed_role.description: The role (<@&{{ role }}>) already exists with the same number of invitations (`{{ number }}`).

existed_role_update.title: Update Role?
existed_role_update.description:
The role (<@&{{ role }}>) already exists.

Do you want to update it with the new number (**{{ number }}**) of invitations?

not_existed_role.title: Role Missing
not_existed_role.description: The role (`{{ role }}`) does not exist.

not_editable_role.title: Role Restricted
not_editable_role.description: The role (<@&{{ role }}>) cannot be assigned by the bot.

error_remove.title: Removal Error
error_remove.description: An error occurred while trying to remove this role (<@&{{ role }}>).

success_remove.title: Role Removed
success_remove.description: The role (<@&{{ role }}>) has been successfully removed.

empty_list.title: No Roles
empty_list.description: You do not have an invitation role. Add some with `/roles add`

role_list.title: Roles Listed
role_list.pre_invalid_description: {{ index }}) <@&{{ role }}> is **inactive** due to permission change
role_list.description:
You have a total of **{{ number }}** invitation roles!

{{ roles }}

data.description: Set a language for the bot

current_language.title: Current language
current_language.description: The current server language is `{{ lng }}`.

error.title: Change Failed
error.description: An error occurred while changing the language to `{{ lng }}`.

success.title: Language Updated
success.description: The server language was set to `{{ lng }}`.

cache.description: Clear the cache on this server

success.description: The server cache has been successfully reset.

error.title: Reset Failed
error.description: An error occurred while trying to clear the server cache.

type.description: Choose the type of channel to define

success_join.description: The join channel has been set to <#{{ channel }}>!

success_leave.title: Set Leave

error_join.description: An error occurred while trying to set the join channel to <#{{ channel }}>.

error_leave.title: Error Leave
error_leave.description: An error occurred while trying to set the leave channel to <#{{ channel }}>.

insufficient_permission.description: You are not authorized to execute this interaction!

success.description: The code (`{{ code }}`) has been successfully updated!

role.label: Specific Role
role.description: The members must have this role to be considered valid.

profile_pic.label: Custom Avatar
profile_pic.description: The member must have a custom avatar.

older.label: Aged Account
older.description: The member must have an aged account.

own_invite.label: No Self-Invite
own_invite.description: The member must not join with their own invitation.

first_join.label: Single Count
first_join.description: The invitation is counted only once.

back_inviter.label: Return Invite
back_inviter.description: The invitation is returned to the original inviter.

role.title: Select Role
role.description: Choose the role where invitations will be considered fake.

success.title: Updated Fake
success.description: The fake system has been updated!

error.title: Error Fake
error.description: An error occurred while trying to update the fake system.

older_nan.title: Invalid Number
older_nan.description: The older must be a valid number.
